basic.description: An overview of selected elements of the geographies of Aboriginal peoples in Canada with a focus on the relationship between Aboriginal peoples and their environments, urbanization and culture change, and colonialism.
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Aboriginal Geographies of Canada

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of Level 3 and (6.0 units from GPHY210; GPHY227; GPHY228; GPHY229) or (3.0 units at the 200 level or above in DEVS or GNDS), or permission of the Department.
